name: The Serf's Tale
overview: The Serf's Tale is a traditional text adventure made using a modified verison of the Quill adventure generation software from Gilsoft. You tell the game what you want to do via a textual interface and the parser is based on a verb / noun input. The Serf's Tale is a rendition of the classic Colossal Cave Adventure by Will Crowther and Don Woods. In this enhanced version there are 16 treasures to collect, locations have been added, existing location text added upon and the major puzzles reworked.
